item.title: 10 Mistakes Leaders Make in Crisis That Break Team Trust
item.description: When times are rocky, how you respond to uncertainty is as important as what you respond with. Here’s what to avoid.

item.title: How Cadillac Is Leveraging F1 Racing to Drive Customer Acquisition
item.description: You can’t buy an F1 race car, but a CT5-V Blackwing is attainable for around $101,000.

item.title: Markets Are Done With Knee-Jerk Reactions to Tariffs
item.description: Trump’s trade war is on, but investors have had a muted response.

item.title: 8 Emotional Intelligence Habits That Make You a Stronger Leader in Stressful Times
item.description: In times of stress, your emotional intelligence can be your greatest competitive edge.

item.title: Warren Buffett Only Needed 1 Sentence to Describe One of Biggest Mistakes You Can Make. It’s a Brilliant Lesson in Emotional Intelligence
item.description: Advice from Buffett that can be applied professionally and personally.
